name: Hell in a Handgun
description: An epic battle between Cowboy Hell and Cowboy Heaven located in the Cowboy Devil's Cowboy Casino! Hell in a Handgun is a Doom-like with a dash of chance for extra flavor. Fight off angels that take the form of your worst fear: cacti. Not to fret! You have your trusty handgun, the Gambler's Gambit, and plenty of magic bullets to send those damn angels back where they came from.
